name: Chuun Máak
description:
Join us in Chuun Máak as we delve into the beginning of the Mayan myth of creation through a series of minigames made to emulate moments of the Popol Vuh where we follow the story of the first men and their encounters with the gods of the long lost civilization. With purely visual storytelling, our team tries to stay true to the classic tale by allowing the player to retrace the steps of the story through flash-inspired games of old. We hope you enjoy our colorful take of this wonderful myth with us!
